jishoData.meaning: once, before, formerly, ever, never, ex-, lick, lap up, burn up, taste, undergo, underrate, despise

onyomiExamples.meaning: ceremonial offering to the deities by the Emperor of newly-harvested rice
ceremonial offering to the deities by the Emperor of newly-harvested rice

kunyomiExamples.meaning: once, before, formerly, ever, former, ex-, never yet, never before, first time, still not happened

to lick, to lap, to suck, to taste, to experience (esp. a hardship), to underestimate, to make light of, to look down on (someone), to make a fool of, to treat with contempt, to disparage, to lick (at; of flames), to burn
